info.title: getExtendedAddressInformation example
info.description: This is an API example for getExtendedAddressInformation, a method to retrieve extended information about a specific address on the TON blockchain.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get extended information for

200.description: Extended information about the specified address

balance.description: The balance of the address in nanotons

state.description: The state of the address (active, uninitialized, etc.)

lt.description: The logical time of the last transaction

hash.description: The hash of the last transaction

code_hash.description: The hash of the contract code

data_hash.description: The hash of the contract data
